Madoff's game

Our exciting new game : try to win the jackpot. If you don't you start earning dividends from new players.
In this game you always win something, the only question is : HOW MUCH ?


Current jackpot : ... TRX

... will win in:
Current stage: 1, share price: 10 TRX

TronLink is not connected. Please, install and log in into TronLink

Mining transaction…



MY WALLET :

My current earnings : 0 TRX

** Once jackpot get hit you can withdraw your part from jackpot earnings here

Withdraw your part of the 20% from the jackpot here

If you are the winner withdraw the jackpot here

We are a new TRON gambling dapp

In this game the last player who had buy a share when the countdown end win the jackpot.
Each time a new player buy a share the countdown get reset and the jackpot get inscrease by 40% of the share price.
The rest of the share price is split among previous players.

Win the jackpot

If countdown reach 0: the last player that had buy a share win 80% of the jackpot.

The rest: 20%, is split equally among all unlucky shareholders.

If jackpot reach is final amount: 25 Billions TRX the last player is the winner.

Once a player win the jackpot you just need to buy one or mulitple shares, this will launch a new game session.


14 Steps

This is a 14 steps game: each time the jackpot reach a certain amount game goes into next step.

On each new step the countdown max time decrease and price per share is increased.

Here you have a board listing the steps:




Earn new players money

Each time a new share is purchase 50% of the share price get split equally among all previous players.

Understand their is no guaranteed return: your earnings depend on how much shares will be purchase after you.

You can withdraw your winning at anytime.

We have realized an imperfect projection on how much you could win depending where you buy your shares.





How To Play

In order to play you need some TRX + TRONLINK plugin installed.
Follow the step bellow if you need help.

Create a Tronlink wallet



Deposit TRX on your Tronlink


Choose the mainnet network and unlock your Tronlink wallet.


Choose a shares number to buy. Click buy and confirm your purchase with the popup.
